responses.rationale: The segment reports locations of cases, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics in the sense of Q9.
Reports the number of birds (35,500) on a farm with a confirmed case, fitting 'Factual Quantification'.
Reports the number of states (23) with confirmed cases based on data, fitting 'Factual Quantification'.
The segment describes the cause of spread, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics in the sense of Q9.
Reports the number of birds killed (5.3 million hens and 88,000 turkeys), fitting 'Factual Quantification'.
Reports the total number of birds killed (about 22 million) and breakdown, fitting 'Factual Quantification'.
Reports the number of birds killed in Iowa (about 13 million chickens and 305,000 turkeys), fitting 'Factual Quantification'.
Reports the number of chickens on farms (46 million), fitting 'Factual Quantification'.
Reports the number of turkeys raised annually (about 11.7 million), fitting 'Factual Quantification'.
